title: Mobile-Based Education Program for International Classification of Nursing Practice (ICNP)

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of Basic Nursing Theories and Practical Experience
context.additional_context: A Blended Learning Course for In-Service Professionals to Understand the ICNP Classification System and Improve Clinical Application Skills. Maximizing Learning Efficiency in Limited Technological Environments by Combining Mobile Apps and Offline Sessions

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic structure and core terminology of the ICNP classification system with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply appropriate ICNP codes with 90% accuracy by analyzing five clinical cases provided in a mobile app.
Learners can fully utilize the ICNP classification system when designing ICNP-based nursing interventions after training.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
